channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 07:30 Done to Donetsk Oblast.Creck on Further Messages.
item.description: 🟢 07:30 Done to Donetsk Oblast.Creck on Further Messages.#Donetsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
